texts: Be careful not to mix up the letters 'I' and 'O' with the numbers '1' and '0'.
Make sure you enter the country of registration accurately. If incorrect information is provided, a Penalty Charge Notice may be issued.

According to our records your vehicle is subject to the £200 daily LEZ charge. This could be because your vehicle's details are registered with us and it doesn't meet the required Low Emission Zone standards.

If we don't recognise your vehicle details then the £200 daily LEZ charge automatically applies. (For example, if your vehicle is registered outside the United Kingdom.) If you believe your vehicle does meet the required standards, you will need to register it with us .
Until your vehicle is successfully registered you will need to pay the £200 daily LEZ charge every time you drive it within the zone.
Our records show that this vehicle does not meet the required standards.

According to our records your vehicle is subject to the £200 daily LEZ charge. This could be because your vehicle's details are registered with us and it doesn't meet the required Low Emission Zone standards.

If we don't recognise your vehicle details then the £200 daily LEZ charge automatically applies. (For example, if your vehicle is registered outside the United Kingdom.) If you believe your vehicle does meet the required standards, you will need to register it with us .
Until your vehicle is successfully registered you will need to pay the £200 daily LEZ charge every time you drive it within the zone.
This vehicle either meets the required standards, is exempt from the scheme or is subject to a 100% discount.
If the number plate is correct but the description shown is wrong, you can still continue to register this vehicle.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA or DVA, so you'll need to let the DVLA or DVA know if your details are wrong or need to be updated.
We do not hold details for this vehicle
UK-registered: If your vehicle’s make and model details have not been returned, make sure you entered the Vehicle Registration Mark correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm this is the correct vehicle to continue.
